tool.name: CleanSam
tool.command: @java_options@ java -jar \$JAVA_JAR_PATH/picard.jar CleanSam INPUT="${inputFile}" OUTPUT="${outFile}" QUIET=true VERBOSITY=ERROR VALIDATION_STRINGENCY=${validation_stringency}

param.name: inputFile
param.label: Select SAM/BAM dataset or dataset collection
param.help: If empty, upload or import a SAM/BAM dataset
